title: Modern Warfare: Today's Diggers
abstract: Commissioned by the Australian War Memorial, these works show Australian soldiers on duty, filmed on location in Afghanistan and Iraq.
description: These five films were commissioned by the Australian War Memorial as part of their tradition of documenting Australians' experience at war. Shot on location in Afghanistan and Iraq in 2011 and 2008, the films are made in a vivid and direct style. They record the surroundings, equipment and day-to-day activities of Australian Defence Force personnel on deployment in a remote and harsh environment, in an actual theatre of war. Interviews with the men and women on active service are the heart and soul of these films, as the participants speak frankly about their experiences and challenges.
